string-array.name: myQuotes
string-array.item: “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.”
“I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time.”
“I am not lost for I know where I am. But however, where I am may be lost.”
“Nobody can be uncheered with a balloon.”
“If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.”
